actions.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A061) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 208 (Roll no. 243).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A061) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 208 (Roll no. 243).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A061) offered by Mr. Flake.

description: Page 101, after line 10, insert the following new section:    SEC. 542. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to carry out the functions of the Political Science Program in the Division of Social and Economic Sciences of the Directorate for Social, Behavioral, and Economic Sciences of the National Science Foundation.
purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to carry out the functions of the Political Science Program in the Division of Social and Economic Sciences of the Directorate for Social, Behavioral, and Economic Sciences of the National Science Foundation.
